## addImportsToModule() function

Changes the identified module by adding a couple of imports

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function addImportsToModule(aFile: string, aModules: {
    [identifier: string]: string;
}, aHost: Tree): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aFile | <code>string</code> | the filename |
|  aModules | <code>{</code><br/><code>    [identifier: string]: string;</code><br/><code>}</code> | the modules to be added |
|  aHost | <code>Tree</code> | the tree |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`
